message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This is a high-quality item that I believe would be a great addition to your collection, valued at $10,000 by you. Let me know if this works for you!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget.  While I'm interested, $12,000 is a bit higher than I'd like to spend. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product, given its value to me. What do you think?
